string-array.name: new_version_features
string-array.item: two new themes
animations
backup system
possibility to repair corrupted decks
small widget
intent-based card addition
better card editor: lookup, add card, copy card, reset
new statistic: deck summary
optional wal journaling mode to speed things up
optional sync=off mode to speed things up
better progress bars while learning
localised number appearance
lookup dictionary now for every deck selectable
card details now accessible via click on top bar
option to fix screen orientation
possibility to reset cards progress (in card editor)
faster card browser searching
more convenient lookup via appearing icon
new text selection in card adder and card editor
option to swap question/answer very easily
support for line breaks in card editor and card browser
hide AnkiDroid folder from Android\'s media scanner
support for huge decks in card browser
support for scrolling with hardware buttons
new broadcasting system for showing upgrade messages
support for new dictionaries: fora, nciku, eijiro
a lot of bug fixes
